mapper.select: SELECT denname, dencontact, denaddress, imagecontenttype, imagefilename, denowner, denregistno FROM deninfo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deninfo (denname, dencontact, denaddress, imagecontenttype, imagefilename, denowner, denregistno) VALUES (#{denname}, #{dencontact}, #{denaddress}, #{imagecontenttype}, #{imagefilename}, #{denowner}, #{denregistno})
mapper.update: UPDATE deninfo SET denname=#{denname}, dencontact=#{dencontact}, denaddress=#{denaddress}, imagecontenttype=#{imagecontenttype}, imagefilename=#{imagefilename}, denowner=#{denowner}, denregistno=#{denregistno}
